channel.title: Help with my auto login

item.title: Help with my auto login
item.dc:creator: @Weibs Weibs
item.description:
@Weibs wrote:

[code]program LoginByBigfish;
var t,u,a,b,o,p,n,m,g,h,v,s,user,login,continue2,enter,cancel :integer;
{.include SRL\SRL.scar}

const
Username = ‘bigfish58’;
pass = ‘’;

procedure loadbitmaps;
begin;
user := BitmapFromString(56, 16, ‘z78DAAD58D18EC3200CFBA569’ +
‘A4BDDD63A75BFFFF934E1A3C04191BB3AE0FD1C452088E7148E32’ +
‘FCEED08661F716C11F7887875B68E6B9B3D7106B0E555CEF8AD96’ +
‘AEA8E7D1F1E41DC9985B2447794674364588B6C500189EC663A18’ +
‘1D8FAF8B0779D3CCA9907584106990FF3EC7E4B3C6FF2D1312F70’ +
‘92649FF1AACBAC8127C5278FECE511B766251B27FB32F0A42702D’ +
‘0E858A41503E7B1B3308890B05ACFD9D6CD48DA3150FEE4BD3B78’ +
‘DA7A88FE4C319C5DE7392778C25A0325D456E657AB04E233D1CCB’ +
‘77F7D979DBB6E1CAA5BA718697CA2D8042BADEA79AD8A835EA561’ +
‘752FA53CEB6FBDE24087A53AA1666EFBF6B3976A75FD42A565D95’ +
‘9556CED3FE067524516A7E39F576179D4F8E079477F5DC5F2B9D0’ +
‘33FBACC3795087992638F868FF8AF660BCF2D9A947A08A0E3FB1E’ +
‘2503CD3EA9403F204F935EBFA38E32DE25951A2BB06563BE73DA3’ +
‘3AC113AA1EF3772AE6C2BBDFC219EE9F88A7E69EA52DA48EB0D82’ +
‘63A2CF5E14A2E34E79D086B15639DE6CD78B086D2DA9A4EBD334E’ +
‘7B07E81F9927CE99DF75C6F11EA5F596E9E7A07F0795B37AE1EC6’ +
‘9DC36AD8E75B5C7FCECE64C7AB7494DAC783A3D3243526761F1FB’ +
‘03EBD768246CE44277AFEB9AAE05EDBCEBEF429ABD3E87FD7ECA5’ +
‘97135AAC59E17BB6947DB293FAF47AEF7F25DDC3E8B013AC7C117’ +
‘09F897697BBBFFBFF9F90F7DE0C1D0’);

login := BitmapFromString(18, 14, ‘z78DAA554410AC3300CFB52A’ +
‘8D5D11E53D6FCFF498324070547A9477D10C5A8961D0B630370E3’ +
‘40DE81F6ADB071147E51F6FCC08957537F11DA6D05A765BB808E3’ +
‘5D339AE9F4211D152F587CCC70E24DF1B6BA51A93A949E561C6AA’ +
‘D291F96EAE8916D7F1FD2FD1D79968AD77C4353733BB3AFA7D45B’ +
‘4961E2822A44396FB1A5E4CA8248A4191F8DE6391B9D62F107297’ +
‘D212CE57CCF715BCE7FFD6720E2981E0DD290E6F7072072893021’ +
‘1E1CB1BD8EE155F2D9F79712D7F64AE52E7’);

continue2 := BitmapFromString(19, 19, 'z78DA8D954BB284200C45' +
   'B7143E220CD5D6FD2FE9F9BC0C8E95A68B41DFA2D290934B4072B' +
   '568B66C61B15ACE686159162B16D26EE98E3FE3B287C3DA7AA518' +
   'A3B41DF94A1FC5B59633479A1F568F2CE13FFDB3562C6566CE3E1' +
   'F55F57F357EE27DD5938D7572669FEF88AF9C72412FCA4965E5CE' +
   'AFB8AAF9FEDDC5FD5672E54599958795BF58CEA988B1C4D51A35A' +
   'C61B54D3AAC817BE8768FCA1A484C31452BD4F91A9447EAFD7AD7' +
   'CA9F2D5DDFB88CFB1AC8F527E4CB597A22B5D4BDA6524B4955F94' +
   '7F4192EF75CCA1BA14ACEF3CAEB2E3DDA71961BD66A0AE46A4CD6' +
   '0C5D14DD5C9E1C12AF76EDDB47AA08BDCFB87E117156D95339923' +
   'B12C9A5EB11FD777FC5E27DD47C39229D3B5072596DF7BBEDE9E4' +
   '7622BE5AA31BA71335EA32E9D419A7BC9B9CA355CACF2E932E2ED' +
   '57BFCD253F8D5983355B3EF32FB4BE2C869BF2F7097DD9BE5FD6A' +
   '9F4517B1DFE50922BBD95F0AB1DC49F6FD55B67CE496B2F4F7592' +
   '551AA8827F2DDF1BB3DAFCC4622BFC37C7349E4FE2B838FF084F8' +
   'B8F2FC0166B7C29C');

  enter := BitmapFromString(23, 16, 'z78DA9D94C10E83300C437F0' +
   '9D6368C2362F0FF9F34443818B90ED98AE403A4EE4B1A62B32D53' +
   '35D7D18A6D6D69ABD9A5AF56DB56DF7569E5A66BDDDAEC31BEF77' +
   '86CDA5DA51B287FF537A83786F3C4EBF4B196FA8949F20CEA5C55' +
   '8D879A780CF92B868CA2C37EAC6188B5C383FA2BC3B98B73C113E' +
   '375DD1DA8AA922B3A77EA4F844CD2C99ABB4891C01FF1E04C5DF1' +
   '2789E041AAD8996BAB7A83E3E35E6272D97578CB9057DC2718CF9' +
   'EBE14FF83B34F09508EC7CA67989583743EB57CCA5E67D44C9FA8' +
   '1C553FA8F8CEA40A3355534B31FF4042735B91C4DDF8DF2D743A1' +
   '6794887C4E248E5C03350B9F14CC0FF3ABECD8C436A1625F66676' +
   'C9F7210FEA17ABB2E7BF');

  cancel := BitmapFromString(16, 9, 'z78DAB552410AC03008FB52A' +
   '9196CC716EAFF9F34E83CA488B2519643281A4394A2021838D10E' +
   '60BE6588E2326ED2810F4CB370CE9E97D92A22DD98DC162575BD9' +
   'B06F0393585DF88BB85C0F53C49AECFF3B3835746794C3FEFBFAF' +
   'FFBD1EECC5FFE7D57D36FC1F2E29226554BF010F01C7DB');

end;

procedure check;
begin;
if (findbitmap(enter,o,p)) then
begin
findbitmap(cancel,n,m)
Mouse(n,m,1,1,true)
end;
end;

procedure login1;
begin;
Mouse(12,7,1,1,true)
if (findbitmap(user,t,u)) then
Begin
Mouse(t,u,5,5,true)
Mouse(657,396,1,1,true)
TypeSend(username)
SendText(pass)
if (findbitmap(login,a,b)) then
Begin
Mouse(a,b,1,1,true)
if(findbitmap(enter,v,s)) then
Begin
findbitmap(continue2,g,h)
Mouse(g,h,1,1,true)
End;
End;
End;
end;

begin
setupSRL;
loadbitmaps;
check;
login1;
end.[/code]

Fixed it, I changed all instances of ‘continue’ to ‘continue2’. I’m guesing SRL has a global var named continue. Also I formatted your code, just to make it a little easier to read, and added Begin and End; after your if statements. Take this for example:

If FindThis Then DoThis;

That would work, but this would not:

If FindThis Then DoThis; ThenDoThis;

The reason being, if an if statement fits results fits your requirements, it automatically does the next line. But it will not perform multiple lines, unless you do this:

If FindThis Then Begin DoThis; ThenDoThis; End;

That would work. I hope this clears everything up, and one suggestion. Try to put semicolons at the end of each line that calls a procedure/function ( This does not include after 'Then’s or ‘Begin’, etc. ). If you don’t put semicolons in, then the script could find an error at, say, line 72, but the 10 lines before that have no semicolan after the procedures. So it thinks those 10 lines are all one line, therefore pointing you to the wrong line.

Hope this helped,

-Weibs.

Read full topic

item.title: Help with my auto login
item.dc:creator: @uberhak3r uberhak3r
item.description:

I get an error saying that the bitmap, continue, isnt in a loop :eek:
